Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: a dirt road running through the dark, shadowy forest

A well-worn road cuts through the thickly treed forest. The air is damp with the spring thaw as creatures of many varieties flit about in the nearby underbrush. Light and airy foliage canopies the roadway and allows speckles of dappled sunlight to pool over the ground. The silver glow of moon and star light peeks through the airy canopy of verdant green leaves, infusing the surroundings with barely enough illumination to see clearly. The heavy green foliage of the trees canopies the roadway, blocking out much of the available light. The sun is hidden from view, making the forest a cool shady refuge from the otherwise hot summer day. The darkness of night fills the surroundings with a thick cloak of impenetrable shadow, cicadas crying out their piercing calls from the trees. The canopy of autumnal leaves stretching over the roadway washes the forest in a painter's palette of reds, golds, yellows and browns. The sun pierces through the thinning foliage and washes the area in a rosy golden light. The stars above peek through the thinning foliage, washing over the area in a dim, murky glow. The roadway is canopied by gray, leafless branches. Sunlight bathes the area but does not provide warmth enough to break the icy chill of the winter air. Starlight can be seen through the branches above but the area is still awash in the icy chill darkness of night.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \ \{ A mounted traveler gallops by, leaving a cloud of smoke in his wake. \| A \{ brightly-striped \| small \| slow-moving \| red-striped \| scrawny \| large \} crevice lizard crosses the road. \| Somewhere behind you, a rustling sound is heard followed by a shrill squeak. \| A pair of hawks circle overhead. \| A group of travelers can be overheard whispering of troubles that lurk on the road at night. \| A \{ young \| old \| sickly \| poorly-dressed \| nicely-dressed\} \{ woman \| man \| merchant \| soldier \| mercenary \} \{ smiles \| nods \| grunts \} in passing. \| A cloaked traveler seems to look you over as you pass by before hurrying away. \}\ \\{ An eerie silence falls all around you. \| A \{ brightly-striped \| small \| slow-moving \| red-striped \| scrawny \| large \} crevice lizard crosses the road. \| Somewhere behind you, a rustling sound is heard followed by a startled squeak. \| A pair of hawks circle overhead. \| The sound of footsteps seem to draw closer. \| A piercing cry pervades the night air. \| The road behind you seems to disappear in the darkness. \}\ \}
